heading: Fashionable Thai Sarong Fabric - Can wear every day!
heading1: Wholesale and Retail of Fashaionable Sarong.
love: We love fashion, and we love Thai Sarong, so ... since 2014, we bring you the best Thai Fashionable Sarong fabric.
supply: We supply to customer all over the world. Our service finds Thai Sarong design at Wholesale prices and ship them to your country. We have customers in Portugal,Spain,Polin, US, Canada, Australia, New-Zeeland and Thailand to name a few. Our customer show thier sutsfaction through thier messages and notes in Facebook. We are serving Thai Srong since 2013. Since then we work mainlly online, so feel free to contact us with your fabric needs.
sample: We only have a few samples here on our website
better: It is always better to contact us directly by our Facebook page, Whatsapp or LINE for more info about our latest stock, patterns and prices.
believe: We believe in personal service, so don't hesitate to contact us. We can send you more photo samples by LINE.
approve: Once you approve your order we can ship it in Thailand using 1 Day service, or using DHL for oversea orders.
technical: For any technical issues with the site please contact the website admin: aylon.spigel@gmail.com
